rukus.text: 72|1|geudaeneun malhala : na-ege da-eum-ui gyesiga naelyeojyeossnola ; jin-ui han muliga gyeongcheonghan hu malhagil "sillo ulineun nollaun nangsong-eul deul-eossseubnida
72|2|geugeos(kkulan)eun olbaleum-eulo ganeun gil-eul galikigie ulineun geugeos-eul mid-eossseubnida. geuligo ulineun uli junimkke eotteon daedeunghan jonjaedo duji anh-eul geos-ibnida
72|3|sillo uli junim-ui bu(bu)neun jigohasimyeo geubunkkeseoneun baeujado jasigdo gajiji anh-eusyeossseubnida
72|4|sillo uli jung-ui umaehan janeun hananim-e gwanhayeo gadanghaji anhneun mal-eul hagon hayeossseubnida
72|5|“sillo ulineun ingangwa jin-i hananim-e gwanhayeo gyeolko geojis-eul malhaji anh-eul geos-ila saeng-gaghayeossseubnida”
72|6|“sillo ingan namseongdeul-eun jin namseongdeul-ege boholeul yocheonghagon hayeossgo geulihayeo geudeul(ingan)eun geudeul(jin)ege geodeuleum-eul deohae jueossseubnida”
72|7|“geuligo sillo geudeul(ingan)eun, geudaedeul(jin)i saeng-gaghan geoscheoleom hananimkkeseo geu nugudo gyeolko buhwalsikiji anh-eul geos-ila saeng-gaghayeossseubnida”
72|8|“sillo uliga haneul-eul hult-eoboassdeoni geugos(haneul)i pasukkundeulgwa byeolttongbyeoldeullo gadeugchan geos-eul balgyeonhayeossseubnida”

72|9|“sillo ulineun yeosdeudgi wihae geugos(haneul)e chagseoghagon hayeossseubnida. geuleona yeosdeul-eulyeo haneun janeun ije, geuleul wihae junbidoen eomhohaneun byeolttongbyeol-e jigmyeonhaneun geos-ibnida”
72|10|“jigue issneun jadeul-ege nappeun geos-i uidodoen geos-inji animyeon geudeul junimkkeseo geudeul-ege joh-eun geos-eul wonhasineun geos-inji sillo ulineun moleubnida”
72|11|“sillo uli jung-eneun seonlyanghan jadeul-i issgo uli jung-eneun geuleohji anh-eun jadeul-i issseubnida. ulideul-eun ganeun gil-i jegaggag-ieossseubnida”
72|12|“sillo ulineun jigueseo hananim-eul gyeolko pihaegal su eobs-eumyeo domanghandaedo uliga geubun-eul gyeolko pihaegal su eobs-eum-eul hwagsinhayeossseubnida”

72|13|“sillo uliga indoui malsseum-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae ulineun geugeos-eul mid-eossseubnida. jasin-ui junim-eul midneun jaga issdamyeon geuneun bujoghamdo budanghamdo dulyeowohaji anh-eul geos-ibnida”
72|14|“sillo uliui ilbuneun museullimdeul-imyeo uliui ilbuneun bujolihan jadeul-ibnida. iseullam-eul bad-adeul-in ja geudeul-eun joh-eun geos-eul chuguhan jadeul-ibnida”
72|15|“bujolihan jadeul-e gwanhaeseoneun geudeul-eun jiog-eul wihan jangjagdeomiga doel geos-ibnida”
72|16|man-yag geudeul-i olbaleun gil-eul ttaleumyeo gudgeonhayeossdamyeon naneun geudeul-i pungseonghan mul-eul masidolog hayeoss-eul geos-ila
72|17|geulihayeo naneun geu(eunchong)e gwanhae geudeul-eul siheomhanola. jasin-ui junim-eul tteoollineun il-e deungdollineun ja geubunkkeseoneun geuleul godoen beol sog-e deulge hasil geos-ila
72|18|sillo seong-won-eun hananim-eul wihan geos-ini geudaedeul-eun hananimgwa deobul-eo daleun geos-e gidohaji malla
72|19|sillo hananim-ui jongbog-i seoseo geubunkke gidohal ttae geudeul-eun geuege milchaghagi jigjeon-ieossnola
